Title: The Wrong Trousers
Genre: Animation, Short, Comedy, Crime, Family, Sci-Fi
Writer: Nick Park, Bob Baker, Brian Sibley (additional contributions by), Nick Park (characters), Brian Trueman (based on the story by), Jonathan Trueman (based on the story by)
Plot: Wallace takes in a new lodger, a devious penguin. Sporting some techno-trousers, the penguin plans a grand theft, a plan that involves putting Wallace in danger.
